text: @realDonaldTrump Then why did you dis’ the Democrats for not being helpful in your stupid speech?  Shit, they’re the ones who stayed Friday night and got the bill ready, while McConnell let everyone leave in the SENATE!  Quit calling it “CoronaVirus”. It’s COVID-19 or lowercase coronavirus 💩
